actions.text: Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $2 million and increases funding for the Mentally Ill Offender Treatment and Crime Reduction Act programs by a similar amount.
purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $2 million and to increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (mental health courts) by a similar amount.
